recipesJson.name: godsdog
recipesJson.author: Horsegame
recipesJson.description: I dunno what to write here. This is a weird one, but oddly delicious. Inspiration was taken from @concreteriver's Fiestas and Fiascos and anything by @Philosaphucker with his ability to use big percentages of cactus. Just try it and see :)

reviews.text: This didn't do it for me one bit. Tasted like awful, spoiled fruit pudding. No bueno.
WOW man. It is pretty amazing and I was able to use some of my TFA Papaya..lol
